title: Christmas Market
detail_text: <:th_ch0212/>Wow!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Hehe, it’s really nice, isn’t it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Yeah! It’s just like the Christmas markets back in the States!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Coming here reminds me of Switzerland too~. Mia-chan, want to get something to eat?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Every time I used to go to a Christmas market, I’d always get hot chocolate.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Hot chocolate’s the best~! Why don’t we get some pretzels to eat, too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Not a bad idea.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Hehe, I know, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Oh, that store over there looks good! Let’s go, Emma!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yeah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
